mapper.insert: insert into member(me_id, me_pw, me_gender, me_birth, me_email) values(#{m.me_id},#{m.me_pw},#{m.me_gender},#{m.me_birth},#{m.me_email})
mapper.select: select me_id from member where me_email = #{m.me_email} and me_birth = #{m.me_birth_str}
mapper.update: update member set me_pw = #{m.me_pw}, me_gender = #{m.me_gender}, me_email = #{m.me_email}, me_birth = #{m.me_birth}, me_authority = #{m.me_authority} where me_id = #{m.me_id}
mapper.select: select * from member where me_session_id = #{session_id} and me_session_limit > now()
